description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes (light and dark) and for styling the React application components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container for the application, styled with background color and text alignment.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo, with specific height and pointer event settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Style for the application header, designed to center its contents and provide background colors.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for links within the application, incorporating color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Style for the theme toggle button, including its position, background color, and animations on hover.
